testcase.name: TC01_Amazon Search Testi
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici amazon sayfasina gider......................................passed And iPhone icin arama yapar.................................................passed Then sonuclarin iPhone icerdigini test eder.................................passed And tea pot icin arama yapar................................................passed Then sonuclarin tea pot icerdigini test eder................................passed And flower icin arama yapar.................................................passed Then sonuclarin flower icerdigini test eder.................................passed

testcase.name: TC05_parametre kullanimi
